categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: A unit of clone troopers served in the Grand Army of the Republic and was stationed on Rishi Station on the Rishi Moon during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The unit was led by Clone Sergeant "O'Niner", and consisted of clones CT-327, CT-782 "Hevy", CT-1409 "Echo", CT-00-2010 "Droidbait", CT-4040 "Cutup", and CT-5555 "Fives". After the Defense of Rishi Station, the two remaining members—Echo and Fives—were inducted into the 501st Legion.
